nodes.documentation:
@dev Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop
mechanism that can be triggered by the contract owner.
 * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the
modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to
the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by
simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Emitted when the pause is triggered by the owner.
nodes.name: Paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Emitted when the pause is lifted by the owner.
nodes.name: Unpaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role
to the deployer.
@dev Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.
nodes.name: paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state.
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state.
nodes.name: unpause

 * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the

devdoc.details: Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism that can be triggered by the contract owner. * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be pausable by simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role to the deployer.

pause().details: Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state.
